Module connect4_pattern
Package Client

Class Automate

java.lang.Object
Client.Automate
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAutomate
public class Automate extends Object implements IAutomate

Automate

Represents an Automate, which serves as an intermediate between the Client and the Server.
